metadata.name: Execution via stordiag.exe
metadata.comment: Detects the use of stordiag.exe to execute schtasks.exe systeminfo.exe and fltmc.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\stordiag.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\systeminfo.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\fltmc.exe'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of stordiag.exe to execute schtasks.exe systeminfo.exe and fltmc.exe

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of stordiag.exe. References: https://strontic.github.io/xcyclopedia/library/stordiag.exe-1F08FC87C373673944F6A7E8B18CD845.html, https://twitter.com/eral4m/status/1451112385041911809
